basics.name: Rashi Sahu
basics.label: Full-Stack Developer | Published Researcher
basics.summary: Full-Stack Developer and published researcher, CSE undergraduate (CGPA: 8.58), skilled in building scalable web applications using React, MERN stack, and Firebase. Strong foundation in Data Structures and Algorithms, with 450+ problems solved across LeetCode and GeeksforGeeks.

projects.name: Akshar Mitra - AI-Assisted Dyslexia Detection Platform
projects.summary: Developed scalable frontend and backend modules for an AI-assisted learning platform. Published research paper and hackathon-winning solution.

projects.name: Mental Health Platform
projects.summary: Built modular UI components, implemented Firebase authentication and real-time database features, designed responsive layouts.

projects.name: Job Search Platform
projects.summary: Developed job listing pages with filters, search, and sorting functionality. Improved performance and scalability.

projects.name: Frontend Projects (GSAP Clone, Bubble Game)
projects.summary: Built animation-driven interfaces and interactive browser-based games.

education.institution: Madhav Institute of Technology and Science, Gwalior

awards.title: Published Research Paper
awards.summary: SCIE publication: 'Akshar Mitra: A Multimodal Integrated Framework for Early Dyslexia Detection'

research-papers.title: Akshar Mitra: A Multimodal Integrated Framework for Early Dyslexia Detection
research-papers.summary: Proposed a novel framework combining multimodal data and machine learning for early dyslexia detection, achieving high accuracy and potential for real-world applications.
